TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ProxyGenerator extends System.Object
public ref class ProxyGenerator abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示 Proxy 程式碼產生器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來擷取用來產生 Web 服務的 proxy 類別的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 程式碼[!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)]服務，或具有靜態網頁方法套用的屬性。Use the method to retrieve the ECMAScript (JavaScript) code that is used to generate the proxy class for a Web service, for a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service, or for static page methods that have the attribute applied.

summary.span: 擷取指定型別的 Proxy 產生程式碼。

span.span: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetClientProxyScript (Type type, string path, bool debug);
.method public static hidebysig string GetClientProxyScript(class System.Type type, string path, bool debug) cil managed
public: static System::String ^ GetClientProxyScript(Type ^ type, System::String ^ path, bool debug);

param.name: type
param.span: 可取得指令碼的物件型別。

span.span: The type of the object to obtain the script for.

param.name: debug
param.span: 如果要包含 XML 程式碼註解，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to include XML code comments; otherwise, .

summary.span: 擷取指定型別的 Proxy 產生程式碼。

span.span: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的 Web 服務 proxy 產生 ECMAScript (JavaScript)[!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)]服務，或具有靜態網頁方法套用的屬性。The method returns the proxy-generation ECMAScript (JavaScript) for a Web service, for a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service, or for static page methods that have the attribute applied. `type`參數包含 Web 服務類別、 WCF 服務類別或 ASP.NET 網頁類別的類型。The `type` parameter contains the type of the Web service class, WCF service class, or ASP.NET page class. 當類型為 WCF 服務類別或介面、 類別或介面必須有套用的屬性。When the type is a WCF service class or interface, the class or interface must have the attribute applied. 如果`debug`參數是`true`，產生的程式碼包含可用於 Visual Studio 中的 IntelliSense 支援或其他開發環境的 XML 程式碼註解。If the `debug` parameter is `true`, the resulting code contains XML code comments that can be used for IntelliSense support in Visual Studio or other development environments. 如此一來，產生的指令碼的大小是較大。As a result, the size of the generated script is larger.

exception.span: Proxy 產生不支援指定型別。

span.span: The specified type is not supported for proxy generation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetClientProxyScript (Type type, string path, bool debug, System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint);
.method public static hidebysig string GetClientProxyScript(class System.Type type, string path, bool debug, class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint) cil managed
public: static System::String ^ GetClientProxyScript(Type ^ type, System::String ^ path, bool debug, System::ServiceModel::Description::ServiceEndpoint ^ serviceEndpoint);

param.name: type
param.span: 可取得指令碼的物件型別。

span.span: The type of the object to obtain the script for.

param.name: debug
param.span: 如果要包含 XML 程式碼註解，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to include XML code comments; otherwise, .

summary.span: 使用路徑和服務端點，擷取指定之型別的 Proxy 產生程式碼。

span.span: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type using the path and service end point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的 Web 服務 proxy 產生 ECMAScript (JavaScript)[!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)]服務，或具有靜態網頁方法套用的屬性。The method returns the proxy-generation ECMAScript (JavaScript) for a Web service, for a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service, or for static page methods that have the attribute applied. `type`參數包含 Web 服務類別、 WCF 服務類別或 ASP.NET 網頁類別的類型。The `type` parameter contains the type of the Web service class, WCF service class, or ASP.NET page class. 當類型為 WCF 服務類別或介面、 類別或介面必須有套用的屬性。When the type is a WCF service class or interface, the class or interface must have the attribute applied. 如果`debug`參數是`true`，產生的程式碼包含可用於 Visual Studio 中的 IntelliSense 支援或其他開發環境的 XML 程式碼註解。If the `debug` parameter is `true`, the resulting code contains XML code comments that can be used for IntelliSense support in Visual Studio or other development environments. 如此一來，產生的指令碼的大小是較大。As a result, the size of the generated script is larger.

exception.span: Proxy 產生不支援指定型別。

span.span: The specified type is not supported for proxy generation.
